00046 class _OgreRTSSExport CGProgramWriter : public ProgramWriter
00047 {
00048 
00049 // Interface.
00050 public:
00051 
00055     CGProgramWriter ();
00056 
00058     virtual ~CGProgramWriter ();
00059 
00063     virtual void            writeSourceCode         (std::ostream& os, Program* program);
00064 
00068     virtual const String&  getTargetLanguage            () const { return TargetLanguage; }
00069 
00070     static String TargetLanguage;
00071 
00072 // Protected methods.
00073 protected:
00074 
00076     void        initializeStringMaps        ();
00077 
00079     void        writeProgramDependencies    (std::ostream& os, Program* program);
00080     
00082     void        writeUniformParameter       (std::ostream& os, UniformParameterPtr parameter);
00083 
00085     void        writeFunctionParameter      (std::ostream& os, ParameterPtr parameter);
00086 
00088     void        writeLocalParameter         (std::ostream& os, ParameterPtr parameter);
00089 
00091     void        writeFunctionDeclaration    (std::ostream& os, Function* function, bool & needToTranslateHlsl4Color, ParameterPtr & colorParameter);
00092 
00094     void        writeAtomInstance           (std::ostream& os, FunctionAtom* atom);
00095 
00096 
00097 protected:
00098     typedef     map<GpuConstantType, const char*>::type     GpuConstTypeToStringMap;
00099     typedef     map<Parameter::Semantic, const char*>::type ParamSemanticToStringMap;
00100 
00101 // Attributes.
00102 protected:
00103     GpuConstTypeToStringMap     mGpuConstTypeMap;       // Map between GPU constant type to string value.
00104     ParamSemanticToStringMap    mParamSemanticMap;      // Map between parameter semantic to string value.
00105 };

00110 class _OgreRTSSExport ShaderProgramWriterCGFactory : public ProgramWriterFactory
00111 {
00112 public:
00113     ShaderProgramWriterCGFactory()
00114     {
00115         mLanguage = "cg";
00116     }
00117     virtual ~ShaderProgramWriterCGFactory() {}
00118 
00122     virtual const String& getTargetLanguage(void) const
00123     {
00124         return mLanguage;
00125     }
00126 
00130     virtual ProgramWriter* create(void)
00131     {
00132         return OGRE_NEW CGProgramWriter();
00133     }
00134 
00135 private:
00136     String mLanguage;
00137 
00138 };
